items.name: Bomb
items.description: As an action, you can light a Bomb and throw it at a point up to 60 feet away, where it explodes. Each creature in a 5-foot-radius Sphere centered on that point makes a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 3d6 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.
items.imgAlt: A round iron bomb with a burning fuse.

items.name: Wyvern Poison
items.description: A creature subjected to Wyvern Poison makes a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) Poison damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.
items.imgAlt: A vial of dark green poison, labeled with a wyvern emblem.

items.name: Potion of Fire Breath
items.description: After drinking this potion, you can take a Bonus Action to exhale fire at a target within 30 feet of yourself. The target makes a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 4d6 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. The effect ends after you exhale the fire three times or when 1 hour has passed. This potion's orange liquid flickers, and smoke fills the top of the container and wafts out whenever it is opened.
items.imgAlt: A glass potion bottle filled with swirling orange liquid.

items.name: Longbow
items.description: Ammunition (Range 150/600 ft.; Arrow), Heavy, Two‑Handed. If you hit a creature with this weapon and deal damage to it, you can reduce its Speed by 10 feet until the start of your next turn. If the creature is hit more than once by weapons that have this property, the Speed reduction doesn't exceed 10 feet.
items.imgAlt: A finely crafted wooden longbow with a taut bowstring.

items.name: Alchemist's Supplies
items.description: Utilize: Identify a substance (DC 15), or start a fire (DC 15). Craft: Acid, Alchemist's Fire, Component Pouch, Oil, Paper, Perfume. Artisan's Tools are each focused on crafting items and pursuing a trade. If you have proficiency with a tool, add your Proficiency Bonus to any ability check you make that uses the tool.
items.imgAlt: A leather pouch filled with flasks, powders, and a mortar and pestle.

items.name: Elven Chain
items.description: You gain a +1 bonus to AC while wearing this armor. You can wear this chain shirt even if you lack proficiency with medium armor.
items.imgAlt: A delicate chain shirt made of shimmering silver links.

items.name: Thieves' Tools
items.description: This set of tools includes lock picks, a small file, a set of pliers, and other implements useful for disarming traps and opening locks.
items.imgAlt: A small leather pouch containing picks, tension wrenches, and other locksmith tools.

items.name: Tower Shield
items.description: While wielding this shield, you gain a +2 bonus to AC. As an action, you can brace yourself behind it to gain half cover until the start of your next turn.
items.imgAlt: A massive steel shield, reinforced with wooden backing and rivets.

items.name: Traveler’s Rations
items.description: A day’s worth of preserved food including dried meat, hard bread, and nuts. Can sustain a person for a full day of travel.
items.imgAlt: A bundle of wrapped dry rations, including jerky and dried fruits.

items.name: Silvered Arrows
items.description: These specially crafted arrows are coated with silver, making them effective against certain creatures like lycanthropes and fiends.
items.imgAlt: A quiver of sleek arrows with silver-tipped heads.

items.name: Crystal Orb
items.description: A smooth orb of pure crystal, used by wizards and sorcerers to channel their arcane spells. Can be held in one hand while casting.
items.imgAlt: A transparent orb that glows faintly with magical energy.

items.name: Thunderstone Bomb
items.description: A small stone that, when thrown, creates a deafening explosion. Each creature within a 10-foot radius must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be deafened for 1 minute and take 2d8 Thunder damage.
items.imgAlt: A dark grey stone with crackling energy inside.

items.name: Frost Bomb
items.description: When thrown, this bomb explodes in a burst of freezing air. Each creature in a 5-foot radius must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 3d6 Cold damage and being Slowed until the end of its next turn.
items.imgAlt: A glass sphere filled with swirling blue mist.

items.name: Flash Powder
items.description: A pouch of fine, reactive powder. As an action, you can throw it in the air to create a blinding flash. Creatures within a 5-foot radius must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or be blinded until the end of their next turn.
items.imgAlt: A small leather pouch filled with sparkling powder.

items.name: Smoke Bomb
items.description: Releases a thick cloud of smoke in a 10-foot radius for 1 minute, obscuring vision.
items.imgAlt: A round clay bomb emitting dark smoke.

items.name: Firestorm Bomb
items.description: Upon detonation, releases a chain of fiery explosions. Targets in a 10-foot radius take 4d6 Fire damage (DC 15 Dexterity save for half).
items.imgAlt: A metal sphere covered in glowing runes.

items.name: Acid Bomb
items.description: Releases a corrosive spray upon detonation, dealing 3d6 Acid damage (DC 14 Dexterity save for half) and corroding metal objects.
items.imgAlt: A fragile glass bomb filled with bubbling green liquid.

items.name: Dagger Bomb
items.description: A small bomb packed with razor-sharp shrapnel, dealing 2d10 Piercing damage (DC 14 Dexterity save for half).
items.imgAlt: A crude metal casing filled with tiny blades.

items.name: Feyfire Bomb
items.description: A magical bomb that erupts in eerie green flames, dealing 3d6 Fire damage and marking targets with Faerie Fire (DC 14 Dexterity save).
items.imgAlt: A crystal orb swirling with green fire.

items.name: Lightning Bomb
items.description: Unleashes a powerful electric blast, dealing 4d6 Lightning damage (DC 15 Dexterity save for half).
items.imgAlt: A glass sphere crackling with blue electricity.

items.name: Soulfire Bomb
items.description: A rare bomb that burns both flesh and spirit, dealing 6d6 Fire and 6d6 Necrotic damage (DC 16 Dexterity save for half).
items.imgAlt: A dark metal sphere pulsing with eerie purple flames.

items.name: Climber's Kit
items.description: A set of specialized gear that includes pitons, boot tips, gloves, and a harness. Grants advantage on checks to climb difficult surfaces.
items.imgAlt: A bundle of ropes, pitons, and climbing gear.

items.name: Portable Ram
items.description: A reinforced wooden battering ram, useful for breaking down doors. Grants advantage on Strength checks to break objects.
items.imgAlt: A small, iron-reinforced wooden battering ram.

items.name: Hooded Lantern
items.description: A metal lantern with a hood that can be adjusted to dim or completely block its light. Burns for 6 hours on a flask of oil.
items.imgAlt: A sturdy metal lantern with a hinged hood.

items.name: Rope, Silk (50 ft.)
items.description: A 50-foot length of silk rope, lighter and stronger than hemp rope. Grants advantage on Stealth checks when used for climbing.
items.imgAlt: A coil of strong, lightweight silk rope.

items.name: Tanglefoot Bag
items.description: A small bag filled with sticky resin. When thrown at a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be restrained for 1 minute.
items.imgAlt: A small canvas bag bulging with thick adhesive.

items.name: Grappling Hook
items.description: A metal hook with multiple prongs, attached to a rope for climbing or securing objects.
items.imgAlt: A sturdy metal grappling hook with a long rope.

items.name: Spyglass
items.description: A finely crafted brass telescope that magnifies distant objects by 2 times. A prized tool for scouts and sailors.
items.imgAlt: A brass and leather spyglass, slightly extended.

items.name: Caltrops (Bag of 20)
items.description: A bag of 20 small, sharp metal spikes. Creatures moving through the area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or stop movement and take 1 piercing damage.
items.imgAlt: A small leather pouch spilling tiny metal spikes.

items.name: Healer's Kit
items.description: A leather pouch containing bandages, salves, and herbs. Can be used to stabilize a dying creature without requiring a Medicine check.
items.imgAlt: A small leather bag with various medical supplies.

items.name: Mystic Compass
items.description: A magical compass that always points towards the nearest ley line or magic source instead of north.
items.imgAlt: A silver compass with a glowing blue needle.

items.name: Potion of Healing
items.description: A crimson liquid that restores 2d4 + 2 hit points when consumed.
items.imgAlt: A small glass vial filled with a bright red liquid.

items.name: Potion of Greater Healing
items.description: A stronger variant of the healing potion, restoring 4d4 + 4 hit points.
items.imgAlt: A glass bottle filled with a deep red liquid.

items.name: Potion of Superior Healing
items.description: A rare healing potion that restores 8d4 + 8 hit points.
items.imgAlt: A thick crimson potion in a finely cut bottle.

items.name: Potion of Supreme Healing
items.description: The most powerful healing potion, restoring 10d4 + 20 hit points.
items.imgAlt: A royal red liquid swirling inside an ornate golden flask.

items.name: Potion of Invisibility
items.description: Upon drinking this potion, you become invisible for 1 hour or until you attack or cast a spell.
items.imgAlt: A faintly shimmering, translucent liquid in a crystal bottle.

items.name: Potion of Speed
items.description: Drinking this potion doubles your movement speed and grants an extra action each turn for 1 minute.
items.imgAlt: A glowing yellow liquid that vibrates within the bottle.

items.name: Potion of Resistance
items.description: When consumed, grants resistance to a specific type of damage for 1 hour. The type is determined upon brewing.
items.imgAlt: A potion with shifting colors, matching different elements.

items.name: Potion of Water Breathing
items.description: Drinking this potion allows you to breathe underwater for 1 hour.
items.imgAlt: A blue potion that sloshes as if moving like the ocean.

items.name: Potion of Fire Giant Strength
items.description: Drinking this potion increases your Strength score to 25 for 1 hour.
items.imgAlt: A fiery orange potion contained in a large iron vial.

items.name: Potion of Mind Reading
items.description: For 10 minutes after consuming this potion, you can cast the Detect Thoughts spell without using a spell slot.
items.imgAlt: A silver-blue potion that swirls hypnotically when moved.

items.name: Flamebrand Greatsword
items.description: A massive sword imbued with fire magic. When you hit a creature, it takes an extra 1d6 Fire damage.
items.imgAlt: A massive greatsword engulfed in flickering flames.

items.name: Stormpiercer Rapier
items.description: A rapier that crackles with electricity. On a critical hit, the target takes an additional 2d6 Lightning damage.
items.imgAlt: A thin rapier with a silver blade sparking with lightning energy.

items.name: Dwarven Warhammer
items.description: A heavy hammer crafted by dwarves. Deals 1d8 damage (1d10 if wielded two-handed) and grants advantage on Strength checks when used to break objects.
items.imgAlt: A thick iron warhammer with intricate dwarven runes.

items.name: Venomfang Scimitar
items.description: A curved blade coated in eternal venom. On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or take 2d6 Poison damage.
items.imgAlt: A green-hued scimitar with a snake-like pattern on the blade.

items.name: Shadowstrike Dagger
items.description: This dagger becomes nearly invisible in dim light or darkness. Attacks made while hidden deal an extra 2d6 Necrotic damage.
items.imgAlt: A blackened dagger with an eerie glow along its edge.

items.name: Moonlit Halberd
items.description: A halberd blessed by celestial forces. Glows in the dark and deals an extra 1d8 Radiant damage to undead.
items.imgAlt: A silver halberd glowing with celestial light.

items.name: Voidfang Spear
items.description: A spear forged from a fallen star. Can be thrown up to 60 feet, dealing an additional 1d8 Force damage on impact.
items.imgAlt: A spear with a dark, otherworldly glow around its tip.

items.name: Titan Slayer Axe
items.description: A massive greataxe crafted to battle giants. Deals an extra 2d12 damage against creatures larger than the wielder.
items.imgAlt: A massive axehead inscribed with ancient runes of giant slaying.

items.name: Bloodletting Glaive
items.description: A cursed glaive that drains life from its victims. When you deal damage, regain hit points equal to half the damage dealt.
items.imgAlt: A blood-red glaive with a sinister curved blade.

items.name: Whirlwind Chakram
items.description: A razor-sharp ring that returns to your hand after being thrown. Deals an extra 1d6 Slashing damage when thrown beyond 30 feet.
items.imgAlt: A circular blade with intricate wind-like engravings.

items.name: Smith's Tools
items.description: A set of hammers, tongs, and other implements used for working metal. Required for repairing or crafting metal weapons and armor.
items.imgAlt: A heavy hammer, tongs, and small anvil on a wooden workbench.

items.name: Tinker’s Tools
items.description: A set of fine tools used for repairing small mechanical devices, including clockwork mechanisms and simple constructs.
items.imgAlt: A collection of small gears, screwdrivers, and metal clamps.

items.name: Glassblower's Tools
items.description: Tools for shaping molten glass into delicate objects, such as vials, flasks, and stained-glass windows.
items.imgAlt: A metal blowpipe, tongs, and a partially shaped glass bottle.

items.name: Calligrapher's Supplies
items.description: A set of fine brushes, inks, and parchment, used for crafting elegant scripts or inscribing arcane symbols.
items.imgAlt: An inkwell, quill, and scrolls filled with elegant script.

items.name: Leatherworker's Tools
items.description: Tools for cutting, shaping, and sewing leather into armor, pouches, and boots.
items.imgAlt: A set of leather stamps, cutting tools, and a thick piece of hide.

items.name: Carpenter's Tools
items.description: A set of saws, hammers, and chisels, used to craft wooden objects, repair structures, and build shelters.
items.imgAlt: A wooden toolbox filled with saws, hammers, and carving tools.

items.name: Painter's Supplies
items.description: A set of fine brushes and pigments, used to create paintings or magical runic symbols.
items.imgAlt: A wooden palette with colorful paint and fine brushes.

items.name: Brewer's Supplies
items.description: A set of barrels, tubes, and distillation tools used to ferment drinks, create ales, and even brew potions.
items.imgAlt: A small brewing station with wooden casks and bubbling liquids.

items.name: Jeweler's Tools
items.description: A precision toolkit for cutting, shaping, and setting gemstones into intricate jewelry pieces.
items.imgAlt: A delicate set of pliers, a jeweler's lens, and a partially cut gemstone.

items.name: Weaver's Tools
items.description: A collection of looms, needles, and threads used to create fine fabrics and enchanted garments.
items.imgAlt: A wooden loom with various spools of colorful thread.

items.name: Elven Chain
items.description: You gain a +1 bonus to AC while wearing this armor. You can wear this chain shirt even if you lack proficiency with medium armor.
items.imgAlt: A delicate chain shirt made of shimmering silver links.

items.name: Shadow Silk Armor
items.description: A suit of lightweight black silk that grants advantage on Stealth checks while in dim light or darkness.
items.imgAlt: A dark silk tunic with enchanted shadow embroidery.

items.name: Drakehide Jerkin
items.description: Made from the hide of a young drake, this armor grants resistance to one type of elemental damage (fire, cold, acid, lightning, or poison).
items.imgAlt: A hardened leather jerkin adorned with draconic scales.

items.name: Whisperweave Cloak
items.description: A flowing cloak that muffles footsteps and grants advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.
items.imgAlt: A dark green hooded cloak that shifts slightly in the wind.

items.name: Hardened Leather Cuirass
items.description: A reinforced leather breastplate designed to provide solid protection while remaining flexible.
items.imgAlt: A well-crafted leather cuirass reinforced with metal studs.

items.name: Windrunner Tunic
items.description: A lightweight tunic enchanted to allow swifter movement, increasing the wearer’s speed by 10 feet.
items.imgAlt: A flowing blue tunic embroidered with wind-like patterns.

items.name: Venomguard Vest
items.description: This enchanted vest protects against toxins, granting resistance to poison damage and advantage on saving throws against poison.
items.imgAlt: A dark green vest embedded with alchemical symbols.

items.name: Serpent’s Skin Armor
items.description: Crafted from enchanted snake scales, this armor grants a +2 bonus to Dexterity saving throws.
items.imgAlt: A shimmering green-scaled armor with serpent motifs.

items.name: Moonwoven Jerkin
items.description: This silvery jerkin grants +1 AC and sheds dim light in a 10-foot radius when in darkness.
items.imgAlt: A woven tunic that glows softly under moonlight.

items.name: Wraithhide Armor
items.description: An ethereal armor that renders the wearer invisible while standing still in dim light or darkness.
items.imgAlt: A ghostly leather suit that seems to fade in the dark.

items.name: Ironwood Shield
items.description: A shield crafted from ironwood, as strong as metal but lighter. Grants an additional +1 AC.
items.imgAlt: A wooden shield reinforced with iron bands.

items.name: Aegis of the Phoenix
items.description: A magical shield that absorbs fire damage, reducing fire-based damage taken by half.
items.imgAlt: A crimson shield embossed with the image of a phoenix rising from flames.

items.name: Titan’s Bulwark
items.description: A massive shield that grants resistance to non-magical slashing, piercing, and bludgeoning damage.
items.imgAlt: A colossal shield, as tall as a man, reinforced with stone.

items.name: Spellward Shield
items.description: This enchanted shield grants advantage on saving throws against spells.
items.imgAlt: A silver shield covered in glowing arcane runes.

items.name: Viking Runestone Shield
items.description: A round wooden shield, reinforced with iron bands and engraved with glowing runes. Once per long rest, you can cast Shield of Faith (+2 AC for 10 minutes).
items.imgAlt: A round wooden shield covered in glowing Norse runes.

items.name: Roman Scutum
items.description: A large rectangular shield used by ancient legions. If an ally adjacent to you is also wielding a shield, both of you gain +1 AC.
items.imgAlt: A tall, curved rectangular shield decorated with a golden eagle.

items.name: Greek Hoplite Aspis
items.description: A large bronze shield, nearly indestructible. When you take damage from a melee attack, you can use your reaction to push the attacker 5 feet away.
items.imgAlt: A heavy bronze shield with an embossed Spartan lambda symbol.

items.name: Kite Shield of the Templar
items.description: A tall kite-shaped shield used by holy warriors. Grants resistance to necrotic damage and advantage on saving throws against undead abilities.
items.imgAlt: A white kite shield bearing a crimson cross.

items.name: Buckler of Reflexes
items.description: A small, lightweight metal shield. When wielding this shield, you gain a +1 bonus to AC and can use your reaction to impose disadvantage on an attack made against you.
items.imgAlt: A small round metal buckler, polished to a reflective shine.

items.name: Traveler’s Rations
items.description: A day’s worth of preserved food including dried meat, hard bread, and nuts. Can sustain a person for a full day of travel.
items.imgAlt: A bundle of wrapped dry rations, including jerky and dried fruits.

items.name: Dwarven Stout
items.description: A thick, dark ale brewed by the dwarves. Grants resistance to poison for 1 hour, but causes slight inebriation (-1 to Dexterity checks).
items.imgAlt: A heavy wooden mug filled with frothy, dark beer.

items.name: Elven Moonwine
items.description: A shimmering silver wine distilled under moonlight. Restores 2d6 hit points and grants darkvision for 1 hour.
items.imgAlt: A slender silver bottle filled with softly glowing wine.

items.name: Spiced Firefruit
items.description: A rare fruit that burns with inner heat. Eating it grants resistance to fire damage for 10 minutes, but your breath becomes noticeably hot.
items.imgAlt: A glowing red-orange fruit with embers on its skin.

items.name: Goblin Grog
items.description: A murky greenish-brown drink that smells of mushrooms and regret. Drinking it gives a 50% chance of either gaining temporary hit points or falling unconscious for 1 minute.
items.imgAlt: A crude clay mug filled with bubbling, foul-smelling liquid.

items.name: Ambrosia of the Gods
items.description: A divine nectar said to be gifted by celestial beings. Consuming it restores all hit points and removes all negative conditions.
items.imgAlt: A golden chalice filled with glowing, honey-like nectar.

items.name: Mystic Tealeaf Brew
items.description: A cup of enchanted tea that enhances mental clarity. Grants advantage on Intelligence and Wisdom saving throws for 1 hour.
items.imgAlt: A delicate teacup filled with swirling, fragrant tea.

items.name: Troll Haunch
items.description: A cooked leg of troll meat. Eating it grants regeneration (1 HP per round) for 10 minutes, but the flesh tastes revolting.
items.imgAlt: A charred, thick slab of meat with a faintly greenish hue.

items.name: Infernal Brimstone Brandy
items.description: A devilish spirit brewed in the depths of the Nine Hells. Grants resistance to fire damage and lets you speak Abyssal for 1 hour.
items.imgAlt: A smoky red liquid swirling in an obsidian goblet.

items.name: Ethereal Iceberry Tart
items.description: A delicate pastry infused with the essence of the Feywild. Eating it grants resistance to cold damage and the ability to see invisible creatures for 10 minutes.
items.imgAlt: A frosted pastry that sparkles with blue and white energy.

items.name: Silvered Arrows
items.description: These specially crafted arrows are coated with silver, making them effective against certain creatures like lycanthropes and fiends.
items.imgAlt: A quiver of sleek arrows with silver-tipped heads.

items.name: Flaming Bolts
items.description: Crossbow bolts that ignite upon firing. Each bolt deals an additional 1d6 Fire damage on impact.
items.imgAlt: A bundle of crossbow bolts tipped with glowing embers.

items.name: Voidpiercer Arrows
items.description: Arrows crafted from an unknown cosmic material. They deal an extra 1d8 Force damage and ignore non-magical resistances.
items.imgAlt: A quiver of dark, otherworldly arrows pulsing with purple energy.

items.name: Freezing Javelin
items.description: A javelin enchanted with frost magic. When it hits, the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution save or be slowed until the end of their next turn.
items.imgAlt: A long javelin covered in a layer of frost.

items.name: Piercing Sling Bullets
items.description: Sling bullets forged from dense metal, designed to penetrate armor. They grant a +1 bonus to attack rolls against targets wearing heavy armor.
items.imgAlt: A small pouch containing heavy, sharpened sling bullets.

items.name: Crystal Orb
items.description: A smooth orb of pure crystal, used by wizards and sorcerers to channel their arcane spells. Can be held in one hand while casting.
items.imgAlt: A transparent orb that glows faintly with magical energy.

items.name: Infernal Skull
items.description: A blackened skull infused with fiendish energy. While using it as a spell focus, your necromancy spells deal an extra 1d4 Necrotic damage.
items.imgAlt: A charred skull with glowing red runes on its surface.

items.name: Runed Staff of the Archmage
items.description: A towering staff covered in arcane inscriptions. While attuned, it allows you to reroll a failed spell attack roll once per day.
items.imgAlt: An ancient wooden staff inscribed with glowing runes.

items.name: Druidic Oak Totem
items.description: A carved oak totem blessed by druids. When used as a spellcasting focus, healing spells cast through it restore an additional 1d4 hit points.
items.imgAlt: A small wooden totem carved with nature symbols.

items.name: Celestial Holy Symbol
items.description: A radiant symbol of divine power. When used as a holy symbol, it grants advantage on Charisma (Persuasion) checks when speaking to celestial beings.
items.imgAlt: A golden holy symbol radiating divine light.
